titleStmt.title: At the Court at Whitehall 10 March 1675/6 By the King's Most Excellent Majesty and the Right Honourable the Lords of His Majesties most Honourable Privy Council.
Orders in Council. 1676-03-10
titleStmt.author: England and Wales. Sovereign (1660-1685 : Charles II)
England and Wales. Privy Council. aut

notesStmt.note: Text begins: VVhereas in pursuance of an order of the eighth instant, the Lords Commissioners for Executing the Office of Lord high Admiral of England, did this day report to His Majesty in Council, their approbation of the several rules thereunto annexed, prepared by the Committee of this board for trade, for preventing the fraudulent procuring of passes; ..
Reproduction of original in the Folger Shakespeare Library.
